publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3588 Mr Andy Kerr: Title Conditions (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Title Conditions (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in the sums payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Peter Peacock*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Dr Richard Simpson*
